name: The Candle by the Window.
description:
a reflective piece about slowing down and learning from small, fleeting experiences.

connect with your plants, the moon, and the warmth from the flame of a candle.

controls: mouse to click, up/down on keyboard to choose options.

made in a day or two.

A game made for the O2A2 VN Jam 2022 with less than 1000 words, 1 background image, and 1 piece of background music<3

Thanks for playing<3
